#summary Performance Toolkit 3.1 Release

<wiki:toc max_depth="6" />

== Introduction ==

This page outlines details regarding the Performance Toolkit release to begin the week of June 5, 2009 and ended on July 17, 2009 in the release of v3.1 of the Performance Toolkit.

== Release Team ==

 * Jason - Lead
 * Aaron
 * Maxim
 * Jeff
 * Brian
 * Joe
 * Marcos
 * Guilherme

== Release Schedule ==

Release Start: June 5, 2009

Code Slush: June 19, 2009

Code Freeze: June 26, 2009

Beta Generation/Testing Week: July 3, 2009

RC Generation/Testing Week: July 15, 2009

Official Release: July 17, 2009

http://perfsonar-ps.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/PerformanceToolkit200907Release/schedule.png
